paint() - Method in class brickdestroyer.view.GameBoardView
This is the master method of all draw method.
PauseMenuController - Class in brickdestroyer.controller
Pause Menu Controller is responsible to show and handle all the user interaction with the pause menu in the game of Brick Destroyer.
PauseMenuController(PauseMenuModel, SceneManager) - Constructor for class brickdestroyer.controller.PauseMenuController
 
PauseMenuModel - Class in brickdestroyer.model.game
Pause Menu Model is responsible to provide all the data needed to run the pause menu screen.
PauseMenuModel(GameLogic, GameBoardView) - Constructor for class brickdestroyer.model.game.PauseMenuModel
 
Player - Class in brickdestroyer.model.entities
Player is a concrete class used to represent the entities control by the player in the game of Brick Destroyer.
Player(Point2D, int, int, Rectangle) - Constructor for class brickdestroyer.model.entities.Player
Creates a new player rectangle shape with the given initial position, size, color and the movement behavior depending on the size of the game window.
